Posts.Content: Thank you for your reply Mary K, the calsium was found in the same breast she had cancer in in 2001. She has a partial lumpectomy done at the time.Today she went for a different kind of mammogram to magnify it, with some sort of cube... not sure what she means, She also went for other test scan I think she had to drink something and alos had an injection.. My mom is in Montreal I am in Ontario, I wish I was closer ..
